column4: i've trawled the website for a while. Who can tell me how to enable hdparm for my cdrom on a permanent basis? thanks in advance
you probably need to look in /etc/hdparm.conf
membreya, can you tell me what should be in there?
yeah, everything's explained in config file
not whether ubuntu uses devfs or not tho
anyway, that's quite independent of hdparm/dma
it is relevant to what syntax to use in the conf. are you sure it doesn't?
is it? i didn't know that
you're the one who told me to read the conf ;)
alright, use the one for no devfs systems then
ok it has worked thanks for your help
